content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-23.0, -66.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-23.0, -66.0) with fuel coal and currently processing iron ore into iron plates.
- BeltGroup at position (-24.5, -64.5) connecting the mining drill to the stone furnace, ensuring the transport of materials.

### Iron Ore Mining Site at Position (-14.5, -54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore and depositing it into a wooden chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing extracted iron ore.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with fuel coal, now operational and processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (52.5, -84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing extracted coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### NameError: Undefined Entity Reference
- Ensure all entity classes such as 'Chest' and 'Furnace' are properly defined and imported in your code to avoid NameError exceptions.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
